name: Ark Force
description:
You have One Goal Stay alive in this non stop action Sci-Fi shooter. Kill Aliens as you collect cash to stay alive and replenish your Energy and Health. Earn Enough cash to level up and become stronger to last longer in the fight. Level up to unlock new classes to play a different way!!👽🔫👽

Ark Force needs you to join the Fight !!

{Controls}

Move Left : A(key)

Move Right: D(key)

Shoot Weapon: K(key)

Open Shop Menu:L(key)

Use mouse to make selections To repurchase Health and Energy!!

Rate &&  Review  For the Admiration of the Ark Force!!!✨✨🔫👽👽
